verses.verse: A Song <S%H7892><s%> of degrees <S%H4609><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>. Behold, how good <S%H2896><s%> and how pleasant <S%H5273><s%> it is for brethren <S%H251><s%> to dwell <S%H3427><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> in unity <S%H3162><s%>!

It is like the precious <S%H2896><s%> ointment <S%H8081><s%> upon the head <S%H7218><s%>, that ran down <S%H3381><s%> upon the beard <S%H2206><s%>, even Aaron's <S%H175><s%> beard <S%H2206><s%>: that went down <S%H3381><s%> to the skirts <S%H6310><s%> of his garments <S%H4060><s%>;

As the dew <S%H2919><s%> of Hermon <S%H2768><s%>, and as the dew that descended <S%H3381><s%> upon the mountains <S%H2042><s%> of Zion <S%H6726><s%>: for there the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> the blessing <S%H1293><s%>, even life <S%H2416><s%> for evermore <S%H5769><s%>.
